name: Squewe Run
description:
Squewe Run is is an exciting endless running game.
Be the best and reach the high score.
Collect coins and unlock cute and goofy characters.
Get the strawberry and ride the elephant to smash everything in your path.
Find the wings to get the fly power-up.
Jump in the water for the underwater level.
Collect bonus letters and unlock secret skins.

Features:
-Easy and addictive gameplay
-Lots of handsome skins to unlock
-Beautiful handmade 3D graphics
-Endless runner fun

Download Squewe Run for FREE today and become the best runner out there!
